result.eng: On Thomas's advice it was agreed not to say anything to the media.
result.ga: Ar chomhairle Thomáis aontaíodh gan aon rud a rá leis na meáin
result.orig: Ar chomhairle Thomáis aontaíodh gan aon rud a rá leis na meáin

result.ponchtml: Ar ċoṁairle Ṫomáis aontaíoḋ gan aon rud a rá leis na meáinOn Thomas's advice it was agreed not to say anything to the media.

result.eng: He was the strongest and beat everybody else effortlessly.
result.ga: B'eisean an duine ba láidre acu agus sháraigh sé gach duine eile gan dua

result.ponchtml: B'eisean an duine ba láidre acu agus ẛáraiġ sé gaċ duine eile gan duaHe was the strongest and beat everybody else effortlessly.

result.eng: Letters without a postcode tend to be delayed.
result.ga: Bíonn moill ar litreacha gan cód poist

result.eng: We help homeless people.
result.ga: Cuidíonn muid le daoine gan dídean
result.orig: Cuidíonn muid le daoine gan dídean
result.html: Cuidíonn muid le daoine gan dídeanWe help homeless people.
result.ponchtml: Cuidíonn muid le daoine gan dídeanWe help homeless people.

result.eng: They left without me.
result.ga: D'imigh siad gan mé
result.orig: D'imigh siad gan mé
result.html: D'imigh siad gan méThey left without me.
result.ponchtml: D'imiġ siad gan méThey left without me.

result.eng: We'll do it without further delay.
result.ga: Déanfaidh muid é gan a thuilleadh moille

result.ponchtml: Déanfaiḋ muid é gan a ṫuilleaḋ moilleWe'll do it without further delay.

result.eng: No doubt!
result.ga: Gan amhras
result.orig: Gan amhras
result.html: Gan amhrasNo doubt!
result.ponchtml: Gan aṁrasNo doubt!

result.eng: They can't live without a car.
result.ga: Ní féidir leo maireachtáil gan charr
result.orig: Ní féidir leo maireachtáil gan charr
result.html: Ní féidir leo maireachtáil gan charrThey can't live without a car.

result.eng: It happened unexpectedly.
result.ga: Tharla sé gan choinne
result.orig: Tharla sé gan choinne
result.html: Tharla sé gan choinneIt happened unexpectedly.
result.ponchtml: Ṫarla sé gan ċoinneIt happened unexpectedly.

result.eng: We will come without any delay.

result.html: Tiocfaidh muid gan moill ar bithWe will come without any delay.
result.ponchtml: Tiocfaiḋ muid gan moill ar biṫWe will come without any delay.

result.eng: His son has left him and he has no news of him.
result.ga: Tá a mhac imithe uaidh agus gan tásc ná tuairisc aige air

result.ponchtml: Tá a ṁac imiṫe uaiḋ agus gan tásc ná tuairisc aige airHis son has left him and he has no news of him.

result.eng: A report is to be published without delay.
result.ga: Tá tuarascáil le foilsiú gan mhoill

result.eng: We produce healthy food without too many additives.

result.eng: A country without language is a country without soul.

result.html: Tír gan teanga tír gan anamA country without language is a country without soul.

result.eng: You can drive to plenty of places in Connemara without spending more than an hour on the road.
result.ga: Is féidir leat tiomáint go neart áiteanna in gConamara gan níos mó ná uair a chloig a chaitheamh ar an mbóthar

result.ponchtml: Is féidir leat tiomáint go neart áiteanna in gConamara gan níos mó ná uair a ċloig a ċaiṫeaṁ ar an mbóṫarYou can drive to plenty of places in Connemara without spending more than an hour on the road.

result.eng: They were trying not to hurt the animal in the head.

result.eng: No doubt, the hardship hurt the islanders.
result.ga: Ghoin an cruatan na hoileánaigh gan dabht

result.eng: He drove slowly and carefully. Not without reason, as he was tired.
result.ga: Thiomáin sé go deas réidh Ní gan údar mar bhí sé tuirseach
result.orig: Thiomáin sé go deas réidh Ní gan údar mar bhí sé tuirseach

result.eng: They wouldn't put her in hospital without a reason.
result.ga: Ní chuirfidís san ospidéal í gan údar éigin
result.orig: Ní chuirfidís san ospidéal í gan údar éigin
result.html: Ní chuirfidís san ospidéal í gan údar éiginThey wouldn't put her in hospital without a reason.
result.ponchtml: Ní ċuirfidís san ospidéal í gan údar éiginThey wouldn't put her in hospital without a reason.

result.eng: It was bad of me not to give you advice.
result.ga: Ba chloíte an mhaise dom é gan comhairle a thabhairt daoibh
result.orig: Ba chloíte an mhaise dom é gan comhairle a thabhairt daoibh

result.ponchtml: Ba ċloíte an ṁaise dom é gan coṁairle a ṫaḃairt daoiḃIt was bad of me not to give you advice.

result.eng: It was bad of us not be grateful to him.
result.ga: Ba dona an mhaise dúinn gan a bheith buíoch de

result.html: Ba dona an mhaise dúinn gan a bheith buíoch deIt was bad of us not be grateful to him.

result.eng: He died suddenly and unexpectedly.
result.ga: Fuair sé bás tobann gan choinne
result.orig: Fuair sé bás tobann gan choinne
result.html: Fuair sé bás tobann gan choinneHe died suddenly and unexpectedly.
result.ponchtml: Fuair sé bás tobann gan ċoinneHe died suddenly and unexpectedly.

result.eng: The building collapsed unexpectedly in late afternoon that day.
result.ga: Thit an foirgneamh go talamh gan choinne i ndeireadh tráthnóna an lae úid

result.ponchtml: Ṫit an foirgneaṁ go talaṁ gan ċoinne i ndeireaḋ tráṫnóna an lae úidThe building collapsed unexpectedly in late afternoon that day.

result.eng: Online, cowards have power without responsbility.

result.eng: Jamie was four years old, no more, no less.

result.eng: Our ears are deafened by his constant talk of nothing but Babaí.
result.ga: Tá ár gcluasa bodhraithe aige agus gan as a bhéal ach Babaí
result.orig: Tá ár gcluasa bodhraithe aige agus gan as a bhéal ach Babaí

result.ponchtml: Tá ár gcluasa boḋraiṫe aige agus gan as a ḃéal aċ BabaíOur ears are deafened by his constant talk of nothing but Babaí.

result.eng: Nothing, not even a hedgehog, would be left unturned.
result.ga: Ní bhfágfaí a oiread agus gráinneog fhéir gan tiontú

result.ponchtml: Ní ḃfágfaí a oiread agus gráinneog ḟéir gan tiontúNothing, not even a hedgehog, would be left unturned.

result.eng: You will know you shouldn't grab a hen by its wing.
result.ga: Beidh a fhios agat gan greim eiteoga a fháil ar chirc

result.ponchtml: Beiḋ a ḟios agat gan greim eiteoga a ḟáil ar ċircYou will know you shouldn't grab a hen by its wing.

result.eng: It was difficult to be in with them without turning into one of them.
result.ga: Ba doilig bheith ina gcuideachta gan a bheith mar dhuine acu féin

result.ponchtml: Ba doilig ḃeiṫ ina gcuideaċta gan a ḃeiṫ mar ḋuine acu féinIt was difficult to be in with them without turning into one of them.

result.eng: If only I was as young as you today. I'd spend my live differently.
result.ga: Mo chreach agus mo chrá gan mé chomh hóg leatsa inniu Chaithfinn saol nár chaith mé
result.orig: Mo chreach agus mo chrá gan mé chomh hóg leatsa inniu Chaithfinn saol nár chaith mé
result.html: Mo chreach agus mo chrá gan mé chomh hóg leatsa inniu Chaithfinn saol nár chaith méIf only I was as young as you today. I'd spend my live differently.
result.ponchtml: Mo ċreaċ agus mo ċrá gan mé ċoṁ hóg leatsa inniu Ċaiṫfinn saol nár ċaiṫ méIf only I was as young as you today. I'd spend my live differently.

result.eng: It's a good thing the poor man isn't in.
result.ga: Is mór an gar gan an duine bocht a bheith istigh

result.html: Is mór an gar gan an duine bocht a bheith istighIt's a good thing the poor man isn't in.
result.ponchtml: Is mór an gar gan an duine boċt a ḃeiṫ istiġIt's a good thing the poor man isn't in.

result.eng: He felt sorry for them but there was nothing he could do for them.
result.ga: Bhí truaigh aige dóibh ach truaigh gan tarrtháil a bhí inti
result.orig: Bhí truaigh aige dóibh ach truaigh gan tarrtháil a bhí inti
result.html: Bhí truaigh aige dóibh ach truaigh gan tarrtháil a bhí intiHe felt sorry for them but there was nothing he could do for them.
result.ponchtml: Ḃí truaiġ aige dóiḃ aċ truaiġ gan tarrṫáil a ḃí intiHe felt sorry for them but there was nothing he could do for them.
